```{r}
library(dplyr)


github <-read.csv(file = 'wch_r-source_master_only.csv')

files <- unique(github$file.path)

file_auth
truck_factor <- file_auth %>% group_by(file.path) %>% summarise(Freq=n())
truck_factor
nrow(truck_factor[truck_factor$Freq == 1,]) / nrow(truck_factor)
```
